content: Creating art can be a very rewarding and fulfilling hobby, and it's great that you have found a way to express yourself through your art. It's also interesting that you use technology, such as an iPad or a computer, as part of your artistic process. Using digital tools can offer a range of creative possibilities and allow you to produce and share your work in new ways. I'm glad to hear that you are enjoying your art and continuing to find new ways to express yourself creatively. If you have any other questions about art or anything else, don't hesitate to ask!
